Note: This plugin is discontinoud for mcMMO v2.1+, because it’s now added into the main plugin.

Description

This lightweight plugin is based on the feature request from here. It forwards some useful mcMMO messages to the action chat. Instead that these messages spam the regular chat, you’ll see them above the itembar and they will disappear after a shorten time. Just drop the plugin in your plugins folder and start your server.

If you like the project, leave a star on GitHub and contribute there.

Features

  • Lightweight
  • Support many mcMMO messages
  • Supports localized messages
  • Good performance – Messages are loaded only once in a fast collection

Supported messages

  • All skillup messages
  • Too tired message
  • Ability activate and deactivate messages
  • Tool raise and lower messages
  • Refresh message

Dependencies

  • ProtocolLib
  • mcMMO (Classic)

Commands

  • /mmoaction – toggle the action bar for mcMMO messages
  • /mmoaction progress – toggles the progress bar for the invoker
    (mcmmoaction works too as an alias)
 ​

Permissions

  • mcMMOAction.display – this permission is given by default
  • mcMMOAction.command.toggle

 

 

Source code


You don’t have to decompile the plugin. There is the source code with comments and building utilities.
mcMMOAction is open source and hosted on the free platform GitHub.
Feel free to fork, star, or contribute by making pull requests and/or opening issues.
https://github.com/games647/mcMMOAction
